Can you say the seasons in order starting with winter?
Think about what you do during winter. Can you draw and write about it?
Can you use play clay and paper to create a picnic scene like in the Big Chart? What will you make first?
What letter makes the sound you hear at the beginning and the end of the word seasons? Try to say the sound and write the letter.
Use blocks to build an igloo for winter! How could you build a bigger one?
